metadata.title: CVE-2019-12301 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Percona Server 5.6.44-85.0-1 packages for Debian and Ubuntu suffered anissue where the server would reset the root password to a blank value uponan upgrade. This was fixed in 5.6.44-85.0-2.

criterions.comment: percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
